channel.title: Starting a project
channel.description:
Ok this isn't a very organized topic but here goes I want to start a new server and client project the server will be coded by 3people including me and 2people working on the client.
Postions needed to start A client code(up to 2) And server coders(up to 2)
Positions avaliable Forum mod(up to 3) Forum admin(just 1) and Maybe a hoster for a second world I host my server 24/7 atm but if we have 2worlds it would be even better And the admin must be able to use vbulletin Last but not least SOMEONE TO INSTALL VBULLETIN MODS :) Thanks[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 22, 2008, 09:46:46 PM[/size][hr]wow sad community
